data.title: Aiki Waza Michi Shirube: (Aikido Practice As A Signpost To The Way)
data.meta_description: aiki-waza.pdf - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document is a preface and table of contents for a book titled "Aiki Waza Michi Shirube" which contains selected essays by Donald N. Levine on aikido and nonviolent interaction. The preface provides context for the essays, which evolved from Levine's experience teaching an "Conflict Theory and Aikido" course at the University of Chicago from 1986 to 2010. It describes how the course explored using aikido principles and techniques to examine concepts in conflict theory. The preface traces how Levine's interest in linking aikido and liberal arts led to developing the course and organizing international conferences through the non-profit Aiki Extensions to further apply aikido concepts in other areas.
